definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[חֲמִישִׁית]] abs. 1Ki 14:25 + 4 t.; [[חֲמִשִׁית]] Le 19:25, Je 36:9; [[חֲמִשּׁית]] 1Ki 6:31; cstr. [[חֲמִישִׁית]] Le 27:15, Le 27:19; sf. [[חֲמִישִׁתוֹ]] Le 5:16 + 2 t.; [[חֲמִשִׁיתוֹ]] Le 22:14, Le 27:31; [[חֲמִשִׁתוֹ]] Le 27:27, cf. [[חֲמִשִׁתָיו]] Le 5:24, rd. [[תוֹ]]- Sam. Di (q.v.);—fifth, usu. in enum. days, months, years, sons, etc.; definite, exc. masc. Ge 1:23, Ge 30:17, fem. Ge 47:24, 1Ki 6:31, Ne 6:5; —
[[חֲמִשִּׁית]] 1Ki 6:31 as subst. a fifth part, so [[חֲמִישִׁית]] Ge 47:24, Le 5:6, Le 5:24, Le 22:14, Le 27:13, Le 27:27, Le 27:31, Nu 5:7; cstr. [[חמישׁית כֶּסֶף]] Le 27:15, Le 27:19.
